bug.author: felipecode
bug.summary: Start Positions are different before the first reset.
bug.description: The CARLA simulator periodically resets itself while waiting for the python client to connect. However, If the python client system connects to the CARLA simulator before the server resets a first time, it receives a set of start position in different order. Tested: Carla 0.7.1 Carla 0.8

comments.comment: This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has not had recent activity. It will be closed if no further activity occurs. Thank you for your contributions.
As from version 0.9.0 we no longer have start positions listed, we'll add at some point a system for recommending start locations.
